description: Test suite for utility functions in the backend_service project, specifically testing _parse_cors and _extract_content_and_usage functions.

classes.name: AIResponseUsage
classes.description: A class representing the usage statistics of an AI response, including prompt tokens, completion tokens, and total tokens.

methods.name: test_parse_cors_none_defaults()
methods.description: Tests _parse_cors with None input to verify default origins.

methods.name: test_parse_cors_csv()
methods.description: Tests _parse_cors with CSV input string to verify parsing into list.

methods.name: test_parse_cors_json_array()
methods.description: Tests _parse_cors with JSON array string to verify parsing into list.

methods.name: test_extract_content_and_usage_happy()
methods.description: Tests _extract_content_and_usage with a typical OpenAI API response, verifying content extraction and usage parsing.

methods.name: test_extract_content_and_usage_missing_fields()
methods.description: Tests _extract_content_and_usage with an empty response to verify fallback defaults.
